metadata.description: Unknown actor Michael May gets his big break starring along a laundry list of A-listers in a new Hollywood Superhero Blockbuster. But Michael's good fortune doesn't last long when a Zombie outbreak hits during the script reading party at the Roosevelt Hotel in Hollywood.  Now Michael is thrust into the role of a leader when celebrity zombies begin attacking the unsuspecting cast and crew! Don't miss this incredibly over-the-top parody zombie comic from Zenescope Entertainment!
metadata.name: Hollywood Zombie Apocalypse
